Let's Connect

Available for hire

Hi, I’m Nithya! I’m a 21-year-old final-year BTech student with a passion for software development. I love working with web technologies to build responsive, user-friendly websites. Aside from coding, I’m into photography, music, and art, which inspire me to bring creativity into my work. I’ve completed a 6-month internship at Grow Geni, worked on projects like a Travel Website, a Google Drive clone, and a Ludo game, and I’m currently developing a project using a Deep Learning model (ResNet) for cavity detection. I’m eager to keep learning and growing in this field.

I’m actively seeking opportunities for internships or full-time roles in software development. With a solid foundation in web development and a passion for creating engaging, user-centered designs, I’m ready to bring fresh ideas and hard work to your team. If you’re looking for a developer who’s enthusiastic, adaptable, and eager to grow, I’d love to be part of your journey.
